update.description:
* Add a color picker dialog which can be opened from the inspector:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aWdC0alTYFU

* Also fixed an issue I noticed while changing colors: some visuals and collisions are duplicated when the model is saved. So I added a step to remove all visuals and collisions from a link before adding the real ones.
update.title: Model Editor: Graphical color picker

content.raw: I just removed the Cancel and Ok buttons 384457e :)
content.html: I just removed the Cancel and Ok buttons 384457e :)

content.raw: On 2459082, I also made it so the dialog is created on demand, instead of being created when the inspector is created. Also added the alpha channel.
content.html: On 2459082, I also made it so the dialog is created on demand, instead of being created when the inspector is created. Also added the alpha channel.

content.raw: Oh yeah much better, I don't know why I got so messy there. Done 2459082
content.html: Oh yeah much better, I don't know why I got so messy there. Done 2459082

content.html:
Can the logic be simplified to something like below?

while (newLinkElem->HasElement("visual"))
{
  auto oldVis = newLinkElem->GetElement("visual");
  newLinkElem->RemoveChild(oldVis);
}

I have not tested this
